title: Creation: God Rests
description:
Readings from:

Genesis 2:1-3

Exodus 20:8, 11

Mark 2:23-28

Today's passages were read by Christina Im, co-host and producer of the IMbetween Podcast, a conversation on marriage, parenting, faith, and everything in between.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
